name: Higher Grounds Coffee
address:
806 Red Drive, Ste. 150
Traverse City, MI 49684

roasts.name: Mayan Magic Espresso
roasts.tasting_notes: Roasters call this a Dark roast, but it is far short of the oily ashiness that I would call Dark. In other words, it's the perfect roast level for modern espresso. Complex and mysterious, silky, heavy body. Jolting berries and somewhat sharp acidity up front, revealing a delightfully unexpected long-lasting chocolate aftertaste. A wonderfully interesting espresso, endlessly variable with something new to discover in every shot. Where does that chocolate come from? It sticks around.

roasts.name: Mexican Maya Vinic
roasts.tasting_notes: Perfect Mexican coffee. Chocolate, baking spices, gentle, round sweetness. If you've had good Mexican coffee before, this is like that, only better. Approachable and also deeply layered.
